message: Let's get started! I'll give you a decent chunk, but don't expect to get away with too much!
I'll start with a strong offer, let's see if you can do better than this!
You're starting strong, but I'm not backing down! I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't get too comfortable!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think you're getting the better end of the deal!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this deal, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
You're getting closer, but I'm not budging. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
It's getting late, and I'm not getting any younger! Let's split it down the middle and call it a day.
